item.description:
Since we have such a large response to the original tennis event - we will have another tennis event on Saturday. Some people cannot make it on Sunday which is Mother's day.

In theory we hope to have half the people play on Saturday & the other half on Sunday. After tennis, we will go for dinner nearby in Allston - Bon Chon! If Bon Chon is too crowded we will go to Jo Jo Taipei.

 Join us to play some tennis, find a tennis partner.

All levels are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: We will try be at 2 courts side by side. A tele # will be provided to those that RSVP so you can call or text if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Tennis...part 1
